UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Functional characterisation of the 1-18 fragment of esculentin-1b, an antimicrobial peptide from Rana esculenta.
Literature.Author: Mangoni ML, Fiocco D, Mignogna G, Barra D, Simmaco M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(LC=1.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(LC=4.2µM),Yersinia pseudotuberculosis YPIII(LC=0.1µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(LC=6.1µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci(LC=0.6µM),Pantoea agglomerans Bo-1S(LC=0.8µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(LC=0.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1(LC=2.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(LC=6.5µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 12344(LC=1.4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(LC=2.4µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(LC=3.0µM),Staphylococcus hominis(LC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus capitis(LC=6.3µM),Micrococcus luteus(LC=1.0µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(LC=1.4µM),Candida tropicalis(LC=1.3µM),Candida guilliermondii(LC=0.6µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(LC=1.5µM),Schizosaccharomyces pombe(LC=1.3µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(MIC=12µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(MFC=24µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(LC50=6µM)
